title: The Toonchie5 Interview: Why He’s The “King Opp” of LA, Viral Courthouse Confrontation & More
description:
Toonchie talks about his recent headlines, making money as a rapper, fake gangsters and more!

-----
00:00 Intro
0:15 - Toonchie introduces his homies Glo and Oowap
1:36 - Pressing Adam for f*cking with the opps
5:33 - Beefing with Tr__way on IG Live
7:45 - Toonchie feels like his viral courthouse video misrepresented the situation
14:04 - Always being aware of the politics in the neighborhood
17:00 - Not respecting rappers who blow up and then start affiliating
18:24 - Toonchie, Oowap and Glo all grew up together in the 100’s
20:26 - The backstory behind the viral video that led to his song “Not a Regular Crab”
24:11 - Forcing Adam to smoke w*ed to prove he’s not a fed
26:45 - Toonchie on why he refers to himself as King Opp
27:17 - Joe Budden tried to mark Adam out by telling him he can’t say “opp”
27:58 - Toonchie feels like most of the Youtubers talking about politics don’t know what they’re talking about
29:06 - Creating his own Youtube channel after he learned that other people were making money off his music and stories
32:40 - Pressing Adam for flip-flopping on being in Toonchie’s music video
35:25 - Adam asks about Toonchie’s mental health. Not believing in therapy
43:37 - Reacting to Quando Rondo
44:37 - Explaining the definition of “tap in”
50:17 - Inviting Adam to Set Day. Trying to make Adam a mascot in the music video


-----

NO JUMPER PATREON
